location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Gideon Colquhoun, Assistant in Charge of the Residency at Bussora [Basra] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The text of the letter on the right hand side of the verso of folio 17 has been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter acknowledging a communication dated 15 October 1816 and replies with details of accounts from 1803, as requested.Also enclosed is a copy of a letter from Samuel Manesty to Meerza Mehidi Aly Khan [Mirzā Mahdī ‘Alī Khān], Resident at Bushire, dated 31 January 1802, discussing the sale and delivery of woollen cloth to Bushire.
